_header: Lord Maker of all thing / Almighty God in Majesty
Subjects: Virgin Mary, miracles of; miracles; Jews
Versification: — four-line, twelve-line, six-line — abab, ababababbcbc, aabccb
_description: A miracle of the Virgin Mary: the Jewish Boy — 186 lines in quatrains, abab, mixed with twelves, ababababbcbc; and ending with a six of shorter lines by way of colophon, aabccb

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
LOrd Makere of alle þingAlmihti God in MaiesteÞat
                    euer was wiþ oute biginningAnd art and euermore schal
                    be…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…I writen a boueGod graunt vs IoyIn heuene an
                    hihIhesu for þi Moder loue. A.ME.N
